name: Jewel Blast - Match Gems
description:
Welcome to the world of Jewel Blast!
Jewel Blast is a game for blast game fans!
Start your unique Jewel Blast adventure here!

How to play?
- Tap the gems of the same color to eliminate
- Match as many gems as possible to get a high score
- Make full use of boosters and items
- Relax and enjoy the game

Feature
- Simple and easy game to play
- Different type of gems
- Vary reward events
- Special blasting effects
- Mysterious gems waiting to be discovered

Let's play this fun game together! No hesitate to download Jewel Blast - Match Gems now!
